content.about: Appraisal Firms & Professionals provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Antique Furniture, Vintage Collectibles. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Detroit area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Linda W.
reviews.content: Appraisal Firms & Professionals's knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation Appraisal Firms & Professionals provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: Sarah B.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: David J.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

content.about: Prestige Estate Services provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Antique Furniture, Vintage Collectibles. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Detroit area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: John S.
reviews.content: Professional service with good attention to detail, but would have appreciated more explanation about my antique furniture valuation methodology.

reviews.author: Elizabeth J.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Michael S.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Prestige Estate Services delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

content.about: Detroit Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Detroit area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
